name: The Box of Many Things
description:
People play video games for the purpose of getting lootboxes. 

So I wondered, "Why force them to play games, when you could just give them lootboxes?"

As much as people complain about it, people still only play multiplayer games so they can get more lootboxes. So I made a game where you can spawn as many as you want!

I'm a genius, thank you for noticing. ;)
